CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioners v. OAKLAND CANNABIS BUYERS' COOPERATIVE AND JEFFREY JONES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA D. UNDERWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GERALD F. UELMEN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA D. UNDERWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
